title: Twisted With Sam Tripoli EP 11: Battling the Cobra Kai
description: Twist is back with stories of Edmonton, getting heckled by the Cobra Kai, and white rich youth!  I break down the whole Trevor Noah controversy, The PC police and why I love Jim Norton!  I discuss Indiana's RFRA, I fantasy about robbing an apple store, why Tim Cook is full of shit and Apple should make drinking water!  Please let me know what you like, what you don't like,  please Rate and Review on iTunes and tell a friend!
